summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: ALICE False Eyelashes Natural Wispy Lashes 5 Pairs Multipack
Review Date: 2020/02/25
Store: ALICE
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'ALICE', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Unit Count': '5 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Material Feature': 'Latex Free', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.4 x 3.4 x 0.6 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '680580996247 680580996230'}
Review Text: These are by far the best eyelashes I have ever tried! They are my to go to, they are just so soft and easy to apply. I would highly recommend getting these. Thank you! I will be making more purchases in the future!!
Review Title: My ultimate favorite!!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: PLEELL False Eyelashes Pack Professional Reusable 5D Mink Lashes - Natural Thick Fluffy Fake Eyelashes Faux Mink Lashes Pack
Review Date: 2020/09/29
Store: Pleell
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Pleell', 'Material': 'Faux Mink', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Package Dimensions': '9.3 x 5.7 x 0.7 inches; 1.59 Ounces'}
Review Text: If your looking for some lashes that don’t feel heavy on your eyelids and make your eyes pop more, then these will be for you! The quality on these lashes are so good. I highly recommend.
Review Title: Amazingggggggg
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: PLEELL Fake Eyelashes 20MM Long Fluffy Mink Lashes Faux Lashes Pack 5 Pairs
Review Date: 2020/12/17
Store: Pleell
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Pleell', 'Material': 'Mink Fur', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Package Dimensions': '4.13 x 3.58 x 0.55 inches; 0.63 Ounces'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:3d60ee897e20e02f814a0aea3514b11]] Let me start by saying, in person, these lashes look better! I took these pictures yesterday when I received them. They are super fluffy and they have a feeling of soft touch. I'm wearing them at the exact moment and they feel light on the eyelids, which is good for my sensitive eyes. Definitely suggest getting a hold of these!
Review Title: Amazing
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: PLEELL 30 Pairs False Eyelashes 6 Styles Mixed Fluffy Lashes 13-19MM Long 3D Volume Dramatic Mink Fake Lashes Pack
Review Date: 2021/01/18
Store: Pleell
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Pleell', 'Material': 'Mink Fur', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Package Dimensions': '10.39 x 7.68 x 0.51 inches; 4.23 Ounces'}
Review Text: I loved these lashes. They are soft and give you a lot of volume and aren’t too heavy on your eyelids. They come in 30 pairs which is a lot for a good price. Would definitely buy more.
Review Title: Amazing
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Lashes 20MM False Eyelashes Dramatic Fluffy 3D Faux Mink Lashes Pack Thick Wispy Crossed Strip Fake Eyelashes Handamade Reusable Soft Eye Lashes by Yawamica
Review Date: 2021/03/20
Store: Yawamica
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Yawamica', 'Material': 'Faux Mink', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free, Vegan', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Package Dimensions': '7.28 x 4.92 x 0.47 inches; 1.76 Ounces'}
Review Text: Okay soooo what I first noticed about these eyelashes are how soft they are! They are not too long but not too short just the right length, I love how the band itself is not to heavy nor thick so it doesn’t feel heavy around your eyes. They look great.
Review Title: Yessssssss
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Lashes 25mm Faux Mink Fluffy Eyelashes HeyAlice 40 Pairs 8 Styles Dramatic Eye Lashes Bulk 6D Volume Thick Long Reusable Fake Eyelashes Wholesale
Review Date: 2021/06/03
Store: HeyAlice
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Color': 'Black', 'Brand': 'HeyAlice', 'Material': 'Faux Mink', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Package Dimensions': '13.3 x 7.6 x 0.55 inches; 2.4 Ounces'}
Review Text: Normally the eyelashes I order from Amazon usually have thick tape and makes your eyes feel a little heavy and not to comfortable. Surprisingly these were not bad at all, they are soft, and not so heavy on the eyelids. They make your eyes pop more, with all the volume that these lashes have. Not to mention you get 40 lashes for the price, you can’t beat.
Review Title: Great deal, not bad.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

    1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The purchase history reveals a strong preference for false eyelashes, emphasizing comfort, softness, and lightweight wearability. The consistent high ratings, averaging around 4.3 to 5, illustrate satisfaction with the product quality. Positive sentiments commonly mention the lashes' softness, ease of application, and flattering appearance, indicating a preference for natural-looking enhancements.

Key themes emerge around the purpose of achieving volume and enhancing eye aesthetics, while the reusable nature of these products signifies a value placed on longevity. Price sensitivity is apparent, as multiple purchases highlight a preference for multipacks that offer substantial quantities at competitive prices, showcasing a desire for economic value without compromising quality.

Material choice is also significant, with consistent reference to cruelty-free and faux mink specifications, aligning with ethical consumerism trends. Overall, the individual demonstrates a preference for well-rated, high-quality, and cost-effective beauty products that accentuate natural beauty while considering comfort and ethical sourcing.

target_interaction.title: Soooooo much fluffff
target_interaction.text: [[VIDEOID:ae81a1f88f878f26126fb47813da2392]] These are one of the cutest lashes I have gotten. They are super fluffy that give you that exaggerating look. But they also feel lightweight in the eyes. I just wore these for my Halloween outfit and I got so many compliments I would post a pic of me wearing them but I look drunk in most of them. Love these though.
target_interaction.title_meta: False Eyelashes Wispy Natural Faux Mink Lashes 10 Pairs Lash Pack Light Volume Short Eefofnn Fake Eye Lashes Multipack
